EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/troubleshooting-with-pcf-metrics-10am]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for today's webinar Troubleshooting App Health and Performance with PCF Metrics 1.2 on Tuesday, November 29, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, November 29, 2016
Time: 10:00am PST / 1:00pm EST
<[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1190422/2B5BECF5845424730286C5CACAAAA5BF]]>
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1293773/B684DA3EE86945BD3D49066057515A25]]>
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us.
The Pivotal Team
